title: Yuumi is obscenely unfun to play against
body: Surely I cant be the only one who thinks that playing against Yuumi is infuriating. Her kit is so basic that you essentially cant mess it up, she does surprisingly high damage and trades disgustingly well with her shield, heal, and base health regen. I don't think she is particularly amazing, yet I cant help but hate the game and everyone i'm playing against whenever I don't spend a ban on her and am forced to either eat a near unmissable skillshot for all of laning phase or walk into the ADC to try trading against the shield that is, of course, still up. I just want to close the client and stop playing league for at least the rest of the day almost every time I queue into one.

See it all depends on which you'd rather have, a champion with a hyper complex kit that it a problem for months because the pros are nut jobs, or a champion that's so simple that when someone does play them right they are infuriating to fight. Eg, Garen.

Yuumi's abilities can slow, buff, heal, shield... She has a mobile AOE ultimate that covers a very large area. But most importantly - her W glues her to the one she's supporting and makes her untargetable. Which, basically... makes Yuumi the easiest - most dumbed down champion in league of legends. You can go premade with your 5 year old sibling or your grandpa if they play Yuumi -  and just tell them when to press Q, E and R... Even if they never played LoL before - if they follow your directions (just pressing one of those 3 buttons when you say so) - they should be able to handle rank games at your level - and do as good as any other support. 

Even more than that.... if you're capable of multitasking - Yuumi's the most viable champion to be played as a duo "by  same user (a user playing on 2 accounts/computers - at the same time)". Since you don't have control her movements (being glued to the other champs) - only 3 of her abilities (mainly 2  - cause the 3rd is her Ultimate).

Based on her abilities - i'd take it Yuumi was made intentionally like that. To be played in a duo by people who don't play league of legends - and be just as good as the ones they're premade with. More exactly... Yuumi was probbaly made for girlfriends (the ones who don't know how to play LoL - and not whiling to try it with any other champ). It's the only champ that can be easily played - while doing other stuff at the same time (browsing social media, taking selfies or whatever). Since you only need one hand and 2 fingers.

This would also explain why this champion is a Cat! 😸
